title: 15. Real Talk: What Winners Do In Times Of Crisis
itunes:title: 15. Real Talk: What Winners Do In Times Of Crisis
description: Our country has hit some hard times recently. Fear and anxiety are sweeping the nation and a lot of people are experiencing adversity. In todays episode, I share with you what you need to understand about adversity and the opportunity it brings.
